item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I have made the decision to have a good Pot Luck Dnner at my home for now, or at least a meeting spot to start with.

Evan is amember of a group that lives far away and has enjoyed our events and has added many nice pictures from our events.

Since he is only able to visit a few days, might as well have some dinner event.

 

Most of you know where i live,

If you need the address let me know.

 

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will put the Cones by the road along with the 6 foot orange Pole

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Evan is Visiting for a few days, POT LUCK DINNER AT AL-R's
